definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: And cloud son still refused to conspiracy with him, refuse to speak a second opinion.
sentences.chinese: 而云子还是不肯跟他斗智斗勇，不肯讲一句实话。

sentences.english: I usually elect to play mind games with any suspected fish before beginning a new drift.
sentences.chinese: 我通常选择于开始一次新飘流前跟可疑的鱼儿斗斗智。

sentences.english: Bidding is a battle of wits, and landscape engineering projects make no exceptions as well.
sentences.chinese: 投标报价是一个斗智的过程，园林工程项目也不例外。

sentences.english: It took him a few minutes to get his wits back.
sentences.chinese: 它把他几分钟让他斗智斗勇回来。

sentences.english: Its beams bear colored paintings illustrating the story about Sun Bin and Pang Juan.
sentences.chinese: 榭内横梁上彩绘历史上著名的“孙庞斗智”故事。

sentences.english: In order to save the Village Chief, Goku must match strength and wits against General White.
sentences.chinese: 要想救出村长，小悟空必须和白将军斗智斗勇一番。

sentences.english: My personal temperament is that I like protecting victims and I like to engage in intellectual combat.
sentences.chinese: 从个性上说，我喜欢保护受害者，喜欢斗智。

sentences.english: The gang members are playing a cat-and mouse game.
sentences.chinese: 帮派人员在玩弄斗智施暴的玩艺儿。

sentences.english: This is a story about military strategy and tactics, with some counterintuitive twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个关于军队斗智斗勇的故事，包含跌宕与起伏。

sentences.english: Penguin Generals always win in a battle of wits .
sentences.chinese: 企鹅将军始终赢得斗智周旋。

definition: see 棋逢對手|棋逢对手[qi2 feng2 dui4 shou3]
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to fight and scheme against each other (idiom)/(in palace construction) elaborate and refined
to be evenly matched/to meet one's match
